Translations.Text: Tara pichata, he bibhraanta asbikarakaraisakala
niscaya ahara karaiba yakkuma gachara paraa
se'itorae'i tomaloke peta bharaaba
taduparai tara oparata pana karaiba uttapta utala pani
tara pichata tomaloke trsnatura utara darae se'i pani pana karaiba
Pratiphala dirasata e'itorae ha’ba sihamtara apyayana
Amiye'i tomalokaka srsti karaicho; teneha’le kiya tomaloke bisbasa nakaraa
tomaloke bhabichane tomalokara biryapata samparke
se'ito tomaloke srsti karaa, ne ami srsti karao
amiye'i tomalokara majata mrtyu nirdharana karaicho arau ami aksama naha'om
tomalokara sthanata tomalokara sadrsa anibalai arau tomalokaka ene eta akrtita srsti karaibalai yito tomaloke najana
Arau niscaya tomaloke aragata haicha prathama srsti samparke, tente kiya tomaloke upadesa grahana nakaraa
tomaloke yi bija simca se'i bisaye tomaloke bhabi ca'ichane
se'ito tomaloke ankuraita karaa, ne ami ankuraita karao
ami iccha karaile iyaka khera-kutata parainata karaiba parao, tetiya tomaloke hatasa hai paraiba
(e'i buli) ‘niscaya ami dayagrasta hai parailo’
‘baram ami bancita haicho’
Tomaloke yi pani pana karaa se'i samparke koraacona
meghara paraa se'ito tomaloke nama'i ana, ne ami se'ito barsana karao
ami iccha karaile se'ito luniya karai diba parao. Tathapi'o kiya tomaloke krtajnata prakasa nakaraa
tomaloke yi ju'i jbaloraa se'i bisaye koraacona
tomaloke iyara gacha srsti karaa, ne ami srsti karao
iyaka ami karaicho eta smaraka arau maraubhumitabasa karaa lokara prayojaniya bastu
Eteke tumi tomara mahana pratipalakara namara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa
Eteke ma'i sapata karaicho naksatraraajira astacalara
arau niscaya e'ito eta mahasapata, yadi tomaloke janilahemtena
